snippet.title: What Makes Timelost Early Access worth PLAYING Today?
snippet.description:
TimeLost is a Soulslike Team-Based PvP Arena Fighter. Master precision combat, customize your playstyle through dual-weapon builds, and climb the ranks in Arenas that transcend space and time. 

Find out what makes TimeLost Early Access worth PLAYING today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121320/TimeLost/

#earlyaccess #soulslike #pcgames 

Prepare for Battle
Enter the arena equipped with two distinct weapons, each offering unique skills. Your selections not only define your combat style but also impact your health and dodge capabilities. Strategize and customize to dominate the battlefield.

Master The Art of Defense
Defend with precision by balancing blocks and dodges. Absorb damage with well-timed blocks, but depleting your stamina leaves you exposed. Evade strikes and debuffs with perfectly timed dodges, gaining brief invulnerability. Strategy and reflexes are the keys to dominating the arena.

Intense Combat with Endless Strategy
Engage in fast-paced battles where strategy and precision are key. Compete in ranked arenas, skirmishes, or control points—each match brings new challenges. Customize builds to heal allies, debilitate enemies with status effects, and turn the tide of battle.

Visit the Black Market
The Black Market is the in-game shop where you can purchase new Weapons, Stimulants, Upgrade Chips, and other visual aesthetics to customize your character and weapons. You can acquire currency from competing in matches.

NO MICROTRANSACTIONS!
